titles.title: Men's Health Act of 2003
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish an Office of Men's Health.
Men's Health Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: Men's Health Act of 2003 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to establish within the Department of Health and Human Services an office to be known as the Office of Men's Health. Requires a report.
